features: 32L ROOMY CAPACITY - H18''xW14''xD8 (H45xW35xD20 cm) with expandable big side pockets, three internal pockets, extra large transparent backpack has plenty of space to securely store your items. REFLECTIVE SAFETY STRIPS to enhance visibility near roads

BONUS TSA-approved anti-theft lock to keep your items safe. QUALITY UPGRADE! - reinforced stitching and comfortable padded straps make it the perfect large clear backpack for men and women. Great for moms with babies to serve as a clear diaper backpack

LAPTOP POCKET fits 17” computers in these extra-large sport clear backpacks for school. Clear rucksack is unisex and perfect for everybody. HEAVY-DUTY CLEAR PVC to have everything in sight. Expect all security checks to be as fast as lightning. Clear backpack for women and men is introduced in different colors - pink clear backpack, grey clear backpack, black clear backpack, blue clear backpack, purple clear backpack, green clear backpack, orange clear backpack, turquoise clear backpack

HUGE INNER & OUTER ZIPPERED POCKETS in this extra-large see-through backpack for organization and storage of extra supplies like pens, books, notepads, and anything your day may require. PREMIUM JAPANESE 2-WAY YKK ZIPPERS to securely store your items in a bookbag

BUILT-IN KEY HOLDER for your complete convenience - with its classic design, this clear daypack is perfect for school, university, gym, beach, outings, or any other daily routine. LIFETIME CUSTOMER SUPPORT - ping us 24/7 regarding any questions

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clear PVC backpack for school and work

Are these clear backpacks designed for adults as well, or are they primarily for students? Our clear backpacks are designed for both middle and high school students and adults. We offer a range of styles and sizes to cater to different needs. Is the backpack see-through on all sides, including the back? Yes, our clear backpacks are see-through on all sides, including the back, in compliance with security regulations. What is the carrying capacity of your large clear backpacks? Our large clear backpacks typically have a capacity of 32 liters, providing ample space for your belongings. How much weight does it hold? Our clear backpacks are designed to hold up to 22 pounds (10 kilograms) of weight. This capacity makes them suitable for carrying a variety of items, including textbooks, laptops, and other personal belongings. Can I find adult clear backpacks in colors other than clear? Yes, you can find pink clear backpack, grey clear backpack, black clear backpack, blue clear backpack, purple clear backpack, green clear backpack, orange clear backpack, and turquoise clear backpacks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the bag because my new job has a clear bag policy. So I needed a bag to carry all my things for work. This bag works amazingly. It has so many pockets. So far it has held up great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this backpack for my son, seeing that their school changed the policy to clear backpacks. I must say that this is a very durable and huge book bag able to fit all of his books and anything else he needs to put inside. I must say that it’s impressive that it comes with a combination lock seeing that the backpack is clear and people could see inside. Awesome purchase! I don’t regret it at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect design, size, dimension except for the PVC material
reviews.reviewText: The PVC material is thick and strong but because it is stiff it eventually cracks, particularly at the seams. I would recommend using TPU instead of PVC. TPU is a lot more elastic and pliable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The adjustable straps on this bag are a lot smaller than on the grey bag. But the bag itself is absolutely durable. I love having all the extra pockets. Especially as a female.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best clear backpack I have bought!
reviews.reviewText: My kids require clear backpacks for school. I have gone through countless backpacks, this one is by far the best quality and the largest size! I’m very happy with this purchase and will remain faithful to this company for my future backpack needs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Over the years my son has purchased the clear backpacks/lunch bags. They have easily cracked after short time usage. So far the look and feel right away seems (as advertised) to be much stronger and we believe can last longer. So far, impressed w/quality and look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally a quality product!
reviews.reviewText: Our school district changed requirements to clear backpacks this year. We went through five in the first semester, and duct taped the fifth to make it through the semester. I ordered a SHYLERO backpack and it’s holding up great! The plastic is this enough to withstand the weight of all his books, notebooks, Chromebook, and there is plenty of room to spare! SHYLERO will definitely get our business again! Plus, it’s made in the USA!🇺🇸

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great design and quality
reviews.reviewText: Bag is just as big or bigger than advertised. Seems appear to be strong and sturdy. Zippers aren't cheap crap. Plenty of room for my kid's copious amount of books and supplies. Loving the purchase so far.
